sections.heading: Manslaughter; penalty.(1) A person commits manslaughter if he or she kills another without malice upon a sudden quarrel or causes the death of another unintentionally while in the commission of an unlawful act
sections.text: (2) Manslaughter is a Class IIA felony.SourceLaws 1977, LB 38, ยง 20;Laws 2015, LB605, ยง 10
